locations.Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Back Right Che:
has_bombchus or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or
                can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Boomerang)

exits.Adult Spirit Temple:
can_use(Longshot) and
                ((can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) and has_bombchus) or spirit_temple_shortcuts)

locations.Spirit Temple MQ Map Room Enemy Chest: (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot and can_use(Dins_Fire)
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Silver Block Hallway Ch:
has_bombchus and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and Slingshot and
                (can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                    at('Adult Spirit Temple', (can_use(Fire_Arrows) or
                        (logic_spirit_mq_frozen_eye and can_use(Bow) and can_play(Song_of_Time)))))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Child 3 Gibdo Room Pot: (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword or (Bombs and can_use(Dins_Fire))) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
(Sticks or Kokiri_Sword or (Bombs and can_use(Dins_Fire))) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Child Stalfos Fight Pot: (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
(Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
(Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
locations.Fairy Pot: has_bottle and (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
locations.Spirit Temple MQ After Gate Redead 1: (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
locations.Spirit Temple MQ After Gate Redead 2: (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Spinning Platform Stalf: (Sticks or Kokiri_Sword) and has_bombchus and Slingshot

locations.Spirit Temple MQ Compass Chest:
(can_use(Slingshot) and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7)) or
                can_use(Bow) or
                (Bow and Slingshot)
locations.Spirit Temple Silver Gauntlets Chest:
((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                    (can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_sot or is_adult)) or
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 4) and can_play(Song_of_Time) and (has_explosives or Nuts) and
                    (logic_lens_spirit_mq or can_use(Lens_of_Truth)))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Central Chamber Top Lef:
(is_child and Boomerang and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks) and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7)) or
                (is_adult and (Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump)) or
                can_play(Song_of_Time) or
                (Boomerang and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks) and (Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ GS Sun Block Room:
(logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_gs and Boomerang and
                    (can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_sot)) or
                is_adult
locations.Spirit Temple MQ After Sun Block Room Sk:
(can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_sot or
                is_adult) and can_kill_skulltula
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Child Iron Knuckle:
((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                    (can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_sot or is_adult)) or
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 4) and can_play(Song_of_Time) and (has_explosives or Nuts) and
                    (logic_lens_spirit_mq or can_use(Lens_of_Truth)))

exits.Desert Colossus:
((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                    (can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_sot or is_adult)) or
                ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 4) and can_play(Song_of_Time) and (has_explosives or Nuts) and
                    (logic_lens_spirit_mq or can_use(Lens_of_Truth)) and is_adult)
